item.title: Rescuer Denny (aka, William Ekvall): Arrested in Nashville and China (Multiple Times) [China Compass]
item.description:
Today on the China Compass Podcast I talk to my good friend Denny (aka, William Ekvall Simpson) the day before his sentencing in federal court for singing and praying in front of a Nashville abortion clinic.

We spend most of our time discussing our evangelistic adventures in China (See @chinaadventures on X/Insta for daily China prayer updates), including stories of being chased in the middle of the night with his teenage son and multiple arrests by the Commies (with his teenage daughters).

We also discuss Denny's favorite Chinese place (Summer River, Gansu) and missionary martyr (William Ekvall Simpson) who loaned Denny his name for a season so he could get back into China.

Visit PrayforChina.us to learn how to pray more strategically for all of China.

We finish with talking about how you can pray for Denny and the 10 who will be sentenced. I will post an update here on July 3rd with the results of the actual sentencing. In the meantime, please bookmark Denny's extensive online used bookstore, which is one of the primary ways he supports his family and ministry: https://www.remnantbooks.org/

Welcome to Remnant Books. Our specialty is quality new and used Christian books.  We're sure you'll find that special book whether you're looking for books regarding Church History, Homeschool curriculum, Theology, Evangelism, Missions, Apologetics, Creation/Evolution, Classics, Biographies, or rare, out-of-print Christian titles.

item.title: Hitchhikin’ w Kids, the Drowning of Dr. King, and "Dystopian" Ningxia [China Compass]
item.description:
Welcome to the China Compass Podcast! After I defend my China bonafides, we begin by looking at the flights that are (and are not) available between the US and the Mainland this year (1:40)…

https://simpleflying.com/airlines-with-most-us-china-flights-summer-2024/

Next we look at why many of China’s millionaires are fleeing (5:44) (and how they get their $ out), followed by why I think we shouldn’t be concerned about “most” of the US land being bought by Chinese nationals (10:31) …

https://www.newsweek.com/china-millionaires-leaving-country-1916427

https://nypost.com/2024/06/20/us-news/chinese-owned-farmland-next-to-19-us-military-bases/

CCP is brought to you by Pray for China (www.PrayforChina.us). (15:46) Get daily prayer reminders on Insta or X: @chinaadventures. Here’s today’s post about Shizuishan in Ningxia…

June 26 - Pray for Shizuishan (“Stony Beak Mtn”), in arid Ningxia (宁夏) Province in north-central China. Home to millions of Chinese Muslims, Ningxia is paired with western Missouri for prayer: https://prayforchina.us/states/missouri.html

For more info:

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shizuishan

https://www.asiaharvest.org/christians-in-china-stats/ningxia

After explaining why Halal entrepreneurs in Ningxia are struggling (22:11), it's time for an extended story time… https://www.economist.com/china/2024/05/09/in-todays-china-to-get-rich-is-perilous

First, I talk about my first miserable night in Ningxia, then the two (literal) darkest experiences of my life and losing my brakes on a family road trip across China, and finally hitchhiking with two of my young kids after stupidly running out of gas on a cold night. (26:47)

Finally, after this week’s China Compass Q&A about Chinese Road Trips (41:13), I share the testimony (48:16) of sacrificial missionary, Dr. George King, and his connection to Wiliiam Borden.

https://www.asiaharvest.org/china-resources/gansu/1927-george-king (Also see: www.BordenofYale.com)

Here's the "losing my brakes on a 14k ft. pass" accident article I mentioned during the final segment:

https://chinacall.substack.com/p/runaway-van-14700-feet
